questions.quote: Well, again, sorry about that little mishap. But once you get everything checked out there shouldn't be anymore problems.
My doctor said it might never fully heal. I may never play again.
The bit, the bit I really liked what were the parakeet flew into the mirror. Now that's funny.
Oh, I'm putting up Frank's screen door. This beauty's got a little life in her yet.
Yes! And I am convinced that if she were here with us today, she would agree with me, too.
Did you explain to her about the good naked and the bad naked?
Ooh. Well, this is uh, risky business, huh? I'm all a-twitter.
Well! I can't spend the rest of my life coming into this stinking apartment every ten minutes to pore over the, excruciating minutia, of every, single, daily event..
Well, I got caught up... watching a soap opera. "The Bold And The Beautiful".
Well it's not up my alley! It's one thing if I make it up. I know what I'm doin, I know my alleys! You got me in the Galapagos Islands livin' with the turtles, I don't know where the hell I am.
